update.title: Update
update.text: There is an update available. It will be installed when all tabs for this page are closed.

messages.cardAdded: The card has been added successfully

noCards.text: Currently, you don't have any cards
noCards.buttonText: Click here to add a card

cardStore.storeIsNotInitialized: The list of cards is still loading. Please wait and try again later.
cardStore.cardDoesNotExist: Could not update the card, because it doesn't exist

removeCardDialog.title: Removing the card
removeCardDialog.text: Are you sure you want to remove the {{store}} card from the app?

errors.fileRead: Error while reading the file contents
errors.unsupportedFileFormat: The file format is not supported. Perhaps you have opened a wrong file

unknownError.title: Unknown error
unknownError.text: Please, try again or contact the developer

successfulImportDialog.title: Successful import
successfulImportDialog.text: Your cards have been imported successfully

successfulExportDialog.title: Successful export
successfulExportDialog.text: Your cards have been exported successfully

removeAllCardsDialog.title: Removing all cards
removeAllCardsDialog.text: All the cards are going to disappear from the app. Are you sure you want to continue?
